newsitem.title: USA: Comdisco to supply reconditioned equipment.
newsitem.headline: Comdisco to supply reconditioned equipment.

text.p: Comdisco Inc said its Comdisco Healthcare Group unit won a contract to become the preferred supplier of reconditioned diagnostic imaging and laboratory equipment to University HealthSystem Consortium.

The pact will give the 77 members and 40 affiliates of the academic health centers alliance access to refurbished ultrasound, x-ray and other medical equipment. A Comdisco spokesman said consortium members will have the option of either buying or leasing the equipment. Other terms were not announced.
Comdisco is a technology services company.
Its shares were trading down 1/8 Tuesday at 30-7/8.
